-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Iteratee enumerators for the usb package
--   
--   This packages provides <tt>iteratee</tt> enumerators for the
--   <tt>usb</tt> package.
@package usb-iteratee
@version 0.5


-- | Iteratee enumerators for endpoints.
module System.USB.IO.Iteratee

-- | Iteratee enumerator for reading <i>bulk</i> endpoints.
enumReadBulk :: (ReadableChunk s Word8, NullPoint s, MonadBaseControl IO m) => DeviceHandle -> EndpointAddress -> Size -> Timeout -> Enumerator s m α

-- | Iteratee enumerator for reading <i>interrupt</i> endpoints.
enumReadInterrupt :: (ReadableChunk s Word8, NullPoint s, MonadBaseControl IO m) => DeviceHandle -> EndpointAddress -> Size -> Timeout -> Enumerator s m α

-- | Iteratee enumerator for reading <i>isochronous</i> endpoints.
--   
--   <i>WARNING:</i> You need to enable the threaded runtime
--   (<tt>-threaded</tt>) for this function to work correctly. It throws a
--   runtime error otherwise!
enumReadIsochronous :: (ReadableChunk s Word8, MonadBaseControl IO m) => DeviceHandle -> EndpointAddress -> Vector Size -> Timeout -> Enumerator (Vector s) m α
